ingredients: 1 baguette, cut in half length-wise and toasted
2 tsps minced garlic or ~1/4 tsp garlic powder
2.5 cups minced roma tomatoes (cut so fine its almost a paste)
1⁄3 cup thinly sliced fresh basil leaf
recipe: In a medium mixing bowl, add the tomatoes, garlic, basil, vinegar, olive oil, cheese, salt, and pepper
Mix thoroughly and let sit for at least 15 minutes at room temperature to let the flavors marinate
Slice the bread into individual pieces and spoon the mixture on top
